entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain late this afternoon. Blowing snow this morning. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning then becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
